    • Uses of Condition in fr.sii.ogham.core.condition

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.condition that implement Condition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AndCondition<T>
      Condition that provides a logical AND operation on manipulated conditions.
      class  CompositeCondition<T>
      Base class for operators that handle several sub-conditions like AND operator and OR operator.
      class  FixedCondition<T>
      Basic condition that always give the same result: the result you provided at construction.
      class  NotCondition<T>
      Condition that provides a logical NOT operation on manipulated condition.
      class  OrCondition<T>
      Condition that provides a logical OR operation on manipulated conditions.
      class  PropertyPatternCondition<T>
      Condition that checks if the provided property value matches the provided pattern.
      class  PropertyValueCondition<T>
      Condition that checks if the provided property value is the same as the provided value.
      class  RequiredClassCondition<T>
      Condition that checks if the provided class is available in the classpath.
      class  RequiredPropertyCondition<T>
      Condition that checks if the provided property is defined either in the system property or in the provided properties.
